General.Name: Changzhou Tenglong Auto Parts
General.Description: Changzhou Tenglong AutoPartsCo.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells auto parts in China and internationally. The company offers air-conditioning pipelines, such as compressor suction and exhaust, expansion valve inlet and outlet, heater air conditioning, and condenser connecting pipe assemblies; automotive heat exchange connecting tubes, including heater and oil cooling inlet and outlet pipes, evaporator imported tubes, and inlet pipes; and automotive heat exchange systems comprising filling valves, connectors, pullovers, covers, flanges, brackets, and auto heat exchange accessories. It also provides automotive sensors consisting of diesel engine exhaust temperature, water temperature, and sunlight sensors; EGR cooling parts; auto precision aluminum tubes, such as flat tubes, intercooler tubes, afflux tubes, coaxial tubes, and KOMO pipes; and reservoir package in master cylinder for automobile brake systems. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Changzhou, China.
